channel.title: CVE Feed for libtiff -- libtiff
channel.description: The latest CVEs for libtiff -- libtiff

item.title: CVE-2022-1622|2024-08-03T00:10:03.771Z -- libtiff -- libtiff
item.description: LibTIFF master branch has an out-of-bounds read in LZWDecode in libtiff/tif_lzw.c:619, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit b4e79bfa.

item.title: CVE-2022-1623|2024-08-03T00:10:03.766Z -- libtiff -- libtiff
item.description: LibTIFF master branch has an out-of-bounds read in LZWDecode in libtiff/tif_lzw.c:624, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit b4e79bfa.
